name: Happy Plane
description:
Happy Plane needs your help to conquer some tricky flights.

Help Happy Plane avoid soaring eagles, sharp rocks, jumping roosters and much more as he flies across deserts, mountains, farms, and even a spooky forest in 15 levels of fun and exciting play.

You can download the entire Unity project for this game and use as you wish (customize, resell, etc).

Have Fun!!
